pa/ntes a)/nqrwpoi tou= ei)de/nai o)re/gontai fu/sei. shmei=on d' h( tw=n ai)sqh/sewn a)ga/phsis: kai\ ga xwri\s th=s xrei/as a)gapw=ntai di' au(ta/s, kai\ ma/lista tw=n a)/llwn h( dia\ tw=n o)mma/twn. ou) ga mo/non i(/na pra/ttwmen a)lla\ kai\ mhqe
me/llontes pra/ttein to\ o(ra=n ai(rou/meqa a)nti\ pa/ntwn w(s ei)pei=n tw=n a)/llwn. ai)/tion d' o(/ti ma/lista poiei= gnwri/zein h(ma=s au(/th tw=n ai)sqh/sewn kai\ polla\s dhloi= diafora/s. fu/sei me
